headline: Ford, SK to End U.S. EV Battery Partnership
summary: Ford Motor and SK Group are ending their joint effort to produce electric-vehicle batteries in the U.S., the latest fallout in the auto industry's retreat from EVs.  SK On, the South Korean conglomerate's battery unit, said it will take sole ownership of the joint venture's battery plant in Tennessee.  It will supply batteries to Ford and also produce stationary batteries for energy storage customers such as utilities and data centers.

raw.headline: Ford, SK to End U.S. EV Battery Partnership
raw.summary: Ford Motor and SK Group are ending their joint effort to produce electric-vehicle batteries in the U.S., the latest fallout in the auto industry's retreat from EVs.  SK On, the South Korean conglomerate's battery unit, said it will take sole ownership of the joint venture's battery plant in Tennessee.  It will supply batteries to Ford and also produce stationary batteries for energy storage customers such as utilities and data centers.

headline: Does Ford Still Offer Value After Its 39% 2025 Rally And EV Strategy Shift?
summary: If you are wondering whether Ford Motor at around $13.41 is still a bargain after its big run, or if most of the value is already priced in, this article will walk you through that question step by step. Ford has quietly put up solid returns, rising 2.4% over the last week, 1.9% over the past month, and 39.0% year to date, which naturally raises the question of whether the upside from here justifies the risk. Recent headlines have focused on Ford doubling down on its EV and hybrid strategy...
